Education & Experience
  

  

    
      Education

      
        University of British Columbia, Vancouver
        Master of Data Science, Sep 2025 â€“ Jul 2026
      

      
        Ghulam Ishaq Khan Institute (GIKI), Pakistan
        Bachelor of Data Science, Sep 2021 â€“ Jun 2025
      
    

    
      Experience

      
        Dynamic Solutions & Technology
        BI Intern Â· Jul 2024 â€“ Sep 2024
      

      
        Developed Power BI dashboards for churn and HR analytics using advanced DAX.
        Built a resume screening application using BERT-based NLP models.
        Delivered ERP analytics insights through interactive visualizations.
      

      
        KPMG
        IT & Advisory Intern Â· Jul 2023 â€“ Aug 2023
      

      
        Designed data warehousing and governance workflows.
        Supported DAMA-DMBOK knowledge transfer initiatives.
      
    

    
      Skills

      
        Python, Machine Learning, NLP, Generative AI
        Data Engineering, Apache Spark, SQL/NoSQL
        Docker, Flask, React, Power BI

Projects
  

  

    
    
      
        CurveBall â€” Cricket Analytics Platform
      
      2024â€“2025 Â· Final Year Project
      
        Built a full-stack cricket analytics web application featuring T20/ODI score prediction and genetic algorithm-based team selection.
        Implemented machine learning models using scikit-learn and NumPy for performance prediction and team optimization.
        Integrated OpenCV-based video analytics for batting and bowling performance analysis.
        Designed interactive dashboards and an AI-powered chatbot for match simulations and player insights.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          Vancouver Crime Predictor
        
      
      2025
      
        Built a reproducible machine learning pipeline using Docker and Docker Compose to analyze 530,000+ Vancouver crime records.
        Performed data preprocessing and feature engineering, including temporal and spatial feature extraction.
        Trained and compared Logistic Regression, KNN, and SVM models for crime type classification.
        Generated actionable insights and visualizations to support data-driven resource allocation strategies.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          AI Interview Coach
        
      
      2025
      
        Developed a fully voice-driven AI interview coaching system that conducts mock interviews and provides real-time feedback.
        Integrated OpenAI Whisper for speech-to-text, Text-to-Speech for natural interaction, and GPT-based evaluation.
        Built a Flask backend and React frontend to manage audio processing, interview logic, and AI inference.
        Enabled role-specific interview customization and precise response timing controls.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          Predicting Crime Hotspots in Chicago
        
      
      2025
      
        Analyzed 7.8M+ crime records from the Chicago Police Department using Apache Spark.
        Performed large-scale data preprocessing and temporal feature extraction.
        Applied K-Means clustering on geospatial coordinates to identify high-density crime hotspots.
        Produced hotspot visualizations and trend analyses to support public safety planning.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          Sentiment-Driven Stock Prediction
        
      
      2024â€“2025
      
        Built a sentiment analysis pipeline by scraping DAWN News headlines and computing sentiment scores.
        Integrated sentiment features with HBL stock price data to construct a time-series dataset.
        Trained LSTM models to evaluate the impact of news sentiment on stock price movements.
        Developed interactive visualizations to analyze trends and model performance.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          Resume Screener Application
        
      
      2024
      
        Built an automated resume screening system using BERT-based NLP models.
        Implemented semantic similarity scoring to match resumes against job descriptions.
        Designed preprocessing pipelines for resume text extraction, cleaning, and embedding generation.
        Reduced manual screening effort by ranking candidates based on relevance and skill alignment.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          Coin Canvas
        
      
      2023â€“2024
      
        Developed a cryptocurrency analytics platform using web scraping for real-time and historical data collection.
        Automated ETL pipelines to gather and process three years of historical crypto data.
        Designed three interactive Power BI dashboards for market trends and decision-making.
      
    

    
    
      
        
          InvestiSight
        
      
      2024
      
        Built an NLP-driven system to extract key insights from financial analyst reports.
        Fine-tuned the DistilRoBERTa model using Hugging Faceâ€™s Inference API for large-scale text processing.
        Deployed a Flask-based web application for real-time financial report analysis.
